title: AND NOW MARKDOWN! [POST#3]
content:
Here are some points I want to make:

* KEEP iterating 
* Next we add subs
* Maybe an RSS feed?

title: BACK 2 THE ETHOS! [POST#2]
content: No... FUCK layer 2's! There can be no compromise when it comes to personal freedom. This is not about being difficult or trying to be cute... This is about standing up for ourselves, and letting the counterfeit elite know we do not stand under their fake authority.

title: WELCOME DEGEN'S! [POST#1]
content: This is the first blog post to [P.D.L.P.] and I am planning on posting a helpful blurb everyday or at least as often as I can! This is an ongoing work in progress so stay tuned! Don't miss any badass hacker tips and DEGEN opportunities!
